item.title: CB Connect 7.0 RC1 supports 20 social networks!
item.description:
CB Connect 7.0 RC1 is available for download by all paid members.

This release should have been tagged stable, but our high-quality process mandates a release candidate phase.

CB Connect now supports 20 !!! social network providers letting their users join your website using their favorite social network credentials.

This is a win-win situation with huge benefits for everyone. Website owners open the door for millions of social networking users to join their CB Connect powered website and users can quickly get on board without the need to fill-out new forms remember new password.

Here is the full awesome list:

  1. Facebook
  2. Twitter
  3. Google
  4. Linkedin
  5. Windows Live
  6. Instagram
  7. Foursquare
  8. GitHub
  9. VKontakte
  10. Steam
  11. Reddit
  12. Twitch
  13. Stack Exchange
  14. Pinterest
  15. Amazon
  16. Yahoo
  17. Paypal
  18. Discus
  19. WordPress
  20. Meetup

In addition to the many supported networks, CB Connect can be also configured to:

  • work in Single sign on mode letting users register and login with one click
    -- for quick and simple website joining
  • prefil the registration form with data taken automatically from the social network and letting the user fill in the rest
    -- saves time for sign-ups and lets users override data
  • override approval workflows (on a per social network provider basis) for new users and images brought in from social network (avatar or canvas)
    -- no need to waste time with trusted network data
  • link existing user accounts on your website with social network
    -- make it easy for your existing users to single click login
  • synchronize CB fields with social network available data during registration, login or linking
    -- grab existing data and display on user profiles on your website
  • first redirect and redirect users based on their social network during login
    -- give your social network friends special treatment

As you can see this very powerful add-on is designed to help you boost your website sign-ups by reaching out to millions of social networking website users.

item.title: CB Connect 7.0 beta 5 - help us test!
item.description:
CB Connect 7.0 beta 5 is available for download and testing by all paid members.

If you have been following this add-on's progress you are probably aware that it was delayed because of its dependency on a third-party API library.

Well, we finally decided to drop this dependency and move forward using our own code.

As Kyle already commented this new beta curently supports authentication from the following 10 social newtwork providers:

  1. Facebook
  2. Twitter
  3. Google
  4. Linkedin
  5. Windows Live
  6. Instagram
  7. Foursquare
  8. GitHub
  9. VKontakte
  10. Steam

There are also plans to add more in upcoming CB Connect 7.0 RC release.

As we are currently in rapid development mode we would like as many people to as possible to download and test this new release and report issues in the forum discussion below.

This way we will quickly reach a stable release.

item.title: CB Code Field 1.0 Released!
item.description:
CB Code Field 1.0.2 has been released for CB 2.0.13+
Professional+ members can download

By popular community demand, the CB Team has just released the new CB Code Field add-on that lets you execute PHP code as a CB field!

With this new release you can also create code fields that dynamically auto-refresh when other CB fields change.

Here is a brand new Age Calculation Tutorial that will help you understand this new functionality.

The CB Code Field add-on lets you create as many CB fields as you want that provide output based on PHP code you provide.

Once installed and published you will see 5 new field types available when you create new CB fields:

  • Code
  • Code Check Box (Multiple)
  • Code Drop Down (Multi-select)
  • Code Drop Down (Single Select)
  • Code Radio Buttons

item.title: CB 2.0.13 ready for Joomla 3.5 and PHP 7.0
item.description:
Community Builder 2.0.13 is here and is ready for upcoming Joomla 3.5
Download it now - it's free and super stable

Community Builder 2.0.13 is a maintenance release that fixes 21 bugs and adds 6 new features (PHP 7 compatibility, Bootstrap and Fontawesome updates - see forum discussion for full changelog) paving the way for the upcoming Joomla 3.5 release.

CB 2.0+ websites can be upgraded to latest CB 2.0.13 using the built-in Joomla upgrader or with a simple install over (precautionary backup always recommended) as all previous settings are kept.

The CB Primer Book is valid and the CB 2.0 Add-on compatibility chart has been updated.

CB 2.0.13 now supports PHP 5.3.3 to PHP 7. Please note that Joomla 3.5 will be needed for PHP 7 support, as Joomla 3.4 is not PHP 7 compatible.

item.title: Profile Update Logger 2.1.2 Released
item.description:
Profile Update Logger 2.1.2 has been released for CB 2.0.12+

The CB 2.0.12+ compatible Profile Update Logger add-on lets your authorized users quickly view changes made to user profile fields. It keeps track of when changes were made, old and new values and also which user made each change. The add-on can also be configured to send notification emails on each change.

Professional members can download Profile Update Logger 2.1.2 and just install it using the CB Plugin Management installer.

item.title: Inline editing with new CB Core Ajax 3.0
item.description:
Paid members can download CB Core Ajax Fields 3.0.0

Making CB Field editing easier and quicker is simple with the new CB Core Ajax Fields 3.0 release that supports inline editing on profile pages and even on user lists!

Just install, publish it and then configure each CB Field you want for inline editing.

Once configured, a mouse over on a field will reveal the edit icon that will let you quickly update the specific field value.

This is a huge usability improvement for your users and also a life saver for moderators that need to edit many users directly in user list views.

item.title: Joomla 3.4.7 and patches protect against critical PHP bug
item.description:
"Security is an ongoing journey: The best way to stay safe is to always stay up-to-date" says Beat (CB Team and JSST - Joomla Security Strike Team member).

The previous Joomla 3.4.6 critical security release triggered an in depth security investigation by the JSST Team to better understand the true nature and cause of this vulnerability.

This "follow the code" process has identified the root cause of this issue down to a specific PHP security bug, already fixed on 4th September 2015 in PHP 5.4.45, 5.5.29 and 5.6.13 (and also in all PHP 7 releases) and also in all major Linux distributions back in September 2015

In an effort to help secure Joomla against poorly maintained hosting environments, the Joomla project has released Joomla 3.4.7 along with Joomla 2.5 and 1.5 code fixes.

This means that:

  • All Joomla 3.4 websites should be upgraded to Joomla 3.4.7
  • All Joomla 2.5/1.5 websites that cannot upgrade to Joomla 3 should apply the EOL Security Hotfixes

These actions will protect your Joomla core installation against this specific PHP bug.

You should make sure that your hoster continuously security-maintains your PHP/LINUX environment to keep it up to date (Joomlapolis Hosting does).

Please note that Community Builder 2.0.12 runs just fine with Joomla 3.4.7 (no backwards compatibility issues) and Community Builder's sessions management is not affected by this PHP secutity bug.
